title: This is Korea
brief_description: An account of present-day life in Korea pictured against the background of the Korean conflict. Shows the Korean landscape; the old culture and peace time pursuits of the peoples; Seoul and Fusan before the war; United Nations Forces in action against the Communists; the New Zealand frigate Taupo engaging a shore battery; the combined action of the Commonwealth Forces; New Zealand servicemen on leave in Japan.
